titleStmt.title: To His Grace His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Right Honourable the Estates of Parliament; the petition of Alexander Hamiltoun of Kinkel.
titleStmt.author: Hamilton, Alexander, of Kinkel, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Concerns the suffering and hardship endured by Alexander Hamilton for 14 years for religious nonconformity.
In ms. on verso: Petition Alexr. Hamilton of Kinkell.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
